item.description:
Daniel Chauvin is the entertainment this week at Tatnuck Booksellers from 6:30 pm to 8:30 pm.

Daniel Chauvin is a force to be reckoned with on the Northeastern folk and acoustic scene. Daniel blends the traditional folk sounds of his New England roots with more contemporary rock and country influences to create an original, ear-catching, almost bluegrass finger-style acoustic work that is creatively his own. Having toured the Northeast for a third straight year after the release of his home-grown debut CD "UNRESOLVED" in 2005, Daniel continues to do what he does best...making music, live performances, and recording. Chauvin released 'BETTER PLACES," his second CD in early 2008.

I find his music very relaxing. See you at the show!
item.name: Great Music at Tatnuck with Dan Chauvin
